long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you immediate access to Clavis Clavium (http://clavis.brepols.net/clacla) by clavis and number and avoids a lot of extra clicks and/or open tabs. Just choose one of the available claves in the drop down and supply the number you are looking for. If the corresponding number is found, you will be immediately directed to the detail page.
